CommandDefinition.Name: createremotedestinationinstance
CommandDefinition.Description: Creates a new remote destination instance.

Argument.Name: remotedestinationtype
Argument.Description: The name of the remote destination type (possible values shown by listremotedestinationtypes)

Argument.Name: executiontimeout
Argument.Description: Local orders are cancelled once the execution timeout is reached. Format: 5s, 15 min, 2h, ...

Argument.Name: parameters
Argument.Description: The parameters for the remote destination type or 'help' to show possible parameters
